title: A British woman discovering a 12-year-old Afghan boy who's a 21-year-old jihadi?
subtitle: According to a British newspaper, one mother discovered that her 12-year-old Afghan foster child was an adult terrorist but did not provide proof of the story.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The 12-year-old Afghan adopted child in the United Kingdom was found to be a 21-year-old Jihadi.
